author: Jack Clark
title: Microsoft to Report Revenue in Three Operating Segments
text:
Microsoft Corp. is changing how it reports its revenue and operating income, ahead of its quarterly financial results next month.
Microsoft will group sales into three buckets, called Productivity and Business Processes, Intelligent Cloud and More Personal Computing, the company said Monday in a statement. Microsoft said it will release segment information for fiscal 2014 and 2015, as if reported under the new operating segment structure, on Tuesday. The companyâ€™s fiscal first quarter 2016 results using the new revenue structure will be released Oct. 22.
